Package net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.cpp

Class Summary
ContinuationReader A custom Reader which completely omits C/C++ continuation character sequences from an underlying reader.
CppHandler Implementation of LanguageVersionHandler for the C++ Language.
CppLanguageModule Implementation of the C/C++ Language Module.
CppParser Adapter for the C++ Parser.
CppTokenManager C++ Token Manager implementation.
